title: Your appeal will be decided by an independent tribunal
reviewed: Your appeal will be reviewed by a tribunal made up of a {{tribunalPanel}}. They will consider everything you tell them and make a decision on your entitlement to the {{benefitType}} benefit.
separate: The tribunal are separate from DWP.
UCreviewed: Your appeal will be reviewed by a tribunal made up of a judge and for some appeals, a doctor. They will consider everything you tell them and make a decision.
DLAreviewed: Your appeal will be reviewed by a tribunal made up of a judge and a doctor. They will consider everything you tell them and make a decision on your entitlement to the DLA benefit.
